body:
- Adds a note that `patchelf` still builds from sources when using binary bootstrapping (so, you have to have a C++ compiler or patchelf installed already).
- Removes references to `spack solve` and use instead `spack spec` since clingo is the default
- Adds the undocumented python3?-dev package with header files for the bootstrapping-from-sources strategy
title: Improve bootstrapping docs a hair
